problem: 如图,两条直线分别被三条平行直线l_{1},l_{2},l_{3}所截,若AB=3,BC=6,DE=2,则DF的长为()
answer: 解:∵两条直线分别被三条平行直线l_{1},l_{2},l_{3}所截,∴\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{DE}{EF},∵AB=3,BC=6,DE=2,∴EF=4,∴DF=DE+EF=2+4=6,故选:C．
comment: 本题主要考查平行线分线段成比例的性质,熟练掌握平行线分线段成比例定理是解题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the two straight lines are respectively intercepted by three parallel straight lines l_{N_0}, l_{N_1}, l_{N_2}, if AB = N_3, BC = N_4, DE = N_5, then the length of DF is ()
